response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. I believe it would be a great addition to your collection and perfectly aligns with your needs. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a price of $110 for you to consider. This offer takes into account both the value you place on the product and my aim to ensure a fair transaction. Looking forward to your response!", "product_price": 110}
